pulltitle: Check for a livemode flag before sending an email
pullsbody:
Staging emails are bouncing, so we're going to head off the problem by dumping staging emails to console rather than sending them. 

Related: mozilla/sawmill#85
pull_commit_message: Check for a livemode flag before sending an email

pulltitle: Provide a way to send sms's using local numbers
pull_commit_message: Provide a way to send sms's using local numbers

pulltitle: Provide a way to send sms's using local numbers

pullsbody:
mozilla/webmaker.org#1258

Uses Twilio to send an SMS to the given phone number.

Adds three env vars:
TWILIO_SID - The SID of the Twilio account
TWILIO_AUTH_TOKEN - The Auth Token for the Twilio account
TWILIO_FROM_NUMBER - The from phone number for the SMS

mozilla/webmaker.org#1258

Uses Twilio to send an SMS to the given phone number.

Adds three env vars:
TWILIO_SID - The SID of the Twilio account
TWILIO_AUTH_TOKEN - The Auth Token for the Twilio account
TWILIO_FROM_NUMBER - The from phone number for the SMS

pulltitle: BSD now requires the Content-Length header
pull_commit_message: BSD now requires the Content-Length header

pulltitle: verify email using mailgun before mailing out
pullsbody: introduces a new env variable called MAILGUN_API_KEY, which should be the public mailgun key (not the private one)
pull_commit_message:
Verify email using mailgun before mailing out

Hard error crash still if the mailgun API call itself fails,
rather than validation.

pulltitle: verify email using mailgun before mailing out
pullsbody: introduces a new env variable called MAILGUN_API_KEY, which should be the public mailgun key (not the private one)
